text: Alejandro Padilla (born January 28, 2001) is an American soccer player who plays as a defender for Colorado Springs Switchbacks in the USL Championship on loan from the Colorado Rapids academy.http://rapd.ussoccerda.com/sam/teams/index.php?team=3933800&player;=265406593https://www.uslchampionship.com/alejandro- padilla ==References== ==External links== *Profile at US Development Academy Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC players Category:American soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:Soccer players from Colorado Category:USL Championship players Category:Sportspeople from Colorado Springs, Colorado
title: Alejandro Padilla
